channel.title: Comments on: 30 years ago this Christmas….

item.title: By: Hoops
item.dc:creator: Hoops
item.description:
Everyone's always so ticked off about Lucas muddling with the SW Universe and destroying the original legacy when he made the new Films 1-3.
I'd say SW pretty much jumped the shark when Lucas asked Bea Arthur to sing. And Carrie Fisher. And when he decided to do every single other thing in this Holiday Special.
Wow. I'm trying to think of something worse that I've ever seen in my entire life....
Nope.
Can't.
item.content:encoded:
Everyone’s always so ticked off about Lucas muddling with the SW Universe and destroying the original legacy when he made the new Films 1-3.

I’d say SW pretty much jumped the shark when Lucas asked Bea Arthur to sing. And Carrie Fisher. And when he decided to do every single other thing in this Holiday Special.

Wow. I’m trying to think of something worse that I’ve ever seen in my entire life….

Nope.

Can’t.

item.title: By: bfp
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description:
My eyes, my eyes!!! I need a spoon to remove the memory.
There is also this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DCyPTM2FJgA
Not nearly so bad now.
item.content:encoded:
My eyes, my eyes!!! I need a spoon to remove the memory.

There is also this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DCyPTM2FJgA

item.title: By: Hoops
item.dc:creator: Hoops
item.description:
But then there is this...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=asnVcbWQ2cg
...I think watching this has robbed me of more than 5 minutes. It's awfulness has actually shortened my life expectancy.
item.content:encoded:
